name: Demon Survival: Roguelite RPG
description:
Defeat tons of creatures, learn new magic spells and face fearsome demons in this survival game with roguelite elements!

Demon Survival offers a level-based survival adventure where you must improve your equipment, learn new abilities and overcome different challenges to defeat the fearsome Lord of Hell.

Features:
• Level based survival adventure with roguelite elements.
• Complete quests to unlock new and challenging challenges.
• Upgrade your equipment to become more powerful.
• Rank up to unlock powerful new magic spells.
• Different unlockable game modes.
• Easy one handed controls.
• 8-bit retro aesthetics with pixel art.
• An absolutely amazing Industrial Dark Synthwave soundtrack.
• Casual yet addictive survival experience.
• Optimised for the latest iOS devices.


_______________________________________________________________________________________________________

PLEASE NOTE! Demon Survival is free to play, but it contains advertising and items that can be purchased for real money.
